methods.name: getEnforcePasswordStrength
methods.rawdescription:
Checks if password strength is enforced for system
by retrieving value of `enforceStrength` property from loginOptions response
If false, it takes value from memory,
if true, it refresh the app state value and then retrives data.
methods.description: Checks if password strength is enforced for system by retrieving value of enforceStrength property from loginOptions response If false, it takes value from memory, if true, it refresh the app state value and then retrives data.

jsdoctags.comment: boolean used to refresh the app state where result of loginOptions response is stored. If false, it takes value from memory, if true, it refresh the app state value and then retrives data.
boolean value, true if enforced, false otherwise.

methods.name: getGreenMinLength
methods.rawdescription: Gets the minimal number of characters that a password should have to be considered a “green” strong one.
methods.description: Gets the minimal number of characters that a password should have to be considered a “green” strong one.

jsdoctags.comment: The min length for password or default value.

methods.name: getPasswordStrengthEnforced
methods.rawdescription:
Function determines if enforced strength checks should be enabled for current tenant
based on properties retrieved from loginOptions
   - {refresh: true} - refreshes values of app state and returns fresh values as result of call
methods.description:
Function determines if enforced strength checks should be enabled for current tenant based on properties retrieved from loginOptions

  • {refresh: true} - refreshes values of app state and returns fresh values as result of call

jsdoctags.comment:
object containing specific options:

  • {refresh: true} - refreshes values of app state and returns fresh values as result of call
boolean value, true if strength is enforced for tenant, false otherwise.

methods.name: getPasswordStrengthValidity
methods.rawdescription:
Checks if password strength is enforced for particular tenant
by retrieving value of `strengthValidity` property from loginOptions response
If false, it takes value from memory,
if true, it refresh the app state value and then retrives data.
methods.description: Checks if password strength is enforced for particular tenant by retrieving value of strengthValidity property from loginOptions response If false, it takes value from memory, if true, it refresh the app state value and then retrives data.

jsdoctags.comment: boolean used to refresh the app state where result of loginOptions response is stored. If false, it takes value from memory, if true, it refresh the app state value and then retrives data.
boolean value, true if enforced, false otherwise.
